measure.name: Add AquaTherm System to Each Apartment
measure.description: Add an AquaTherm system to each apartment. This system consists of a small water heater which provides both hot water for showers and sinks, and hot water for heating in the winter. The hot water coil and a separate DX cooling coil are packaged together in a small fan-coil unit recessed in the ceiling. Optionally, this unit may bring in outdoor air for space ventilation.
measure.modeler_description: Loop through the model and add a PTAC with a cycling fan to each thermal zone. Connect the hot water coil in this PTAC to a water loop with a small, constant-volume pump and a small hot water heater. Also, add a shower and a sink to each zone and connect it to the water heater.
